nexttext:
The vacuum state $\vert 0 \rangle$ 
is annihilated by all positively moded oscillators
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left\{\Psi^{a}_{m},\Psi_{n}^{b\dagger}\right\}=\delta_{ab}\delta_{m+n}~{}~{}~%
{},~{}~{}~{}\left\{\tilde{\Psi}^{a}_{m},\tilde{\Psi}_{n}^{b\dagger}\right\}=%
\delta_{ab}\delta_{m+n}." display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi></msubsup><mo>,</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mi>n</mi><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>⁣</mo><mo>†</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+9.9pt"><msub><mi>δ</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mpadded></mrow></mrow><mo rspace="12.4pt">,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><msubsup><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mo stretchy="false">~</mo></mover><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi></msubsup><mo>,</mo><msubsup><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mo stretchy="false">~</mo></mover><mi>n</mi><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>⁣</mo><mo>†</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>δ</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>

prevtext:
The vacuum state $\vert 0 \rangle$ 
is annihilated by all positively moded oscillators
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E2.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left.\begin{matrix}\Psi^{a}_{n}\left|0\right\rangle=0,&\tilde{\Psi}^{a}_{n}%
\left|0\right\rangle=0\cr\Psi^{a\dagger}_{n}\left|0\right\rangle=0,&\tilde{%
\Psi}^{a\dagger}_{n}\left|0\right\rangle=0\cr\end{matrix}\right\}~{}~{}n>0," display="block"><mrow><mtable columnspacing="5pt" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>a</mi></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">|</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mo stretchy="false">~</mo></mover><mi>n</mi><mi>a</mi></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">|</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mi>n</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁣</mo><mo>†</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">|</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ψ</mi><mo stretchy="false">~</mo></mover><mi>n</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁣</mo><mo>†</mo></mrow></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">|</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="9.1pt">}</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>
